alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Audubon; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:59AM CDT until July 12 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR CASS...WESTERN UNION...SOUTHWESTERN GUTHRIE...AUDUBON...ADAMS... NORTHWESTERN RINGGOLD...TAYLOR AND ADAIR COUNTIES... At 656 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Audubon to near Cumberland to 4 miles south of Elliott to 4 miles north of Randolph, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Creston, Atlantic, Audubon, Greenfield, Corning, Bedford, Stuart, Lenox, Griswold, Green Valley Lake, Lake Icaria, Anita, Exira, Adair, Fontanelle, Elk Horn, Lewis, Casey, New Market and Orient. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
